title: Allure
description: After lies and betrayal almost destroyed us, Dean and I fought our way back to each other. But now another battle threatens our fragile reconciliation.Though Dean's protectiveness of me is more powerful than ever, he can't escape his seething jealousy over what I did with another man. And I can't forget his lie, especially when a West family crisis forces us back to his hometown, where I'm confronted by the woman who loved my husband before me.I'd thought we were safe again in the warm, loving haven of our marriage.I was wrong.***Spiral of Bliss Reading Order:AROUSEALLUREAWAKENARRIVEBREAK THE SKYADOREALWAYS
author: Nina Lane
